item.description:
-------THERE WAS AN ERROR -- WE ARE MEETING AT 9:30PM------

Join us this Friday night @Speakers (behind City hall which is on Main St.) in Marlboro -- NO COVER CHARGE.
The "Barstool Brothers" will be playing.

Time to burn up the dance floor or just mix and mingle with your group members or members from other groups!!!

This is a multi-group event & will be cross posted with:
- Central Mass Singles 25-45
- MetroWest 30-40 Something Singles.

Come check this band out with me.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing Mardi-Gras beads for 1st hour
item.name: TGIF Mix & Mingle Dance Party - Fri 7/17 9:30pm @Speakers in Marlboro
